content.raw:
The first version of the pull request used to advertise / unadvertise topics on demand, so the test used to call `SetActive(true)` and `SetActive(false)` and see that topics appeared / disappeared in between.

The latest changes make the topic be always advertised, as usual, but the sensor only subscribes to the filtered messages on demand. I changed the test to test this in 8540ba3
content.html:
The first version of the pull request used to advertise / unadvertise topics on demand, so the test used to call SetActive(true) and SetActive(false) and see that topics appeared / disappeared in between.

The latest changes make the topic be always advertised, as usual, but the sensor only subscribes to the filtered messages on demand. I changed the test to test this in 8540ba3
